title: How vacuum tubes work
creator_credit: Peter Robinson, Leonard Bender and McGraw-Hill Films
brief_description: Explains the structure of a diode and a triode and how they work as a rectifier and amplifier. Illustrates clearly why the hot filament and cold plate will permit the plate current to flow in one direction only and this functions as a half-wave rectifier.
